185820705.review:
this gets 3/5 stars becuase it is the best poker game on steam. it lost 2 stars because of the fact that YOU CANNOT CHANGE THE DAMN RESOLUTION. depending on your screen the pc is connected 2 it will sometimes decide to launch in 340p, other times it opens in 2k. there is no way to change it......... FInal score 3/5.

since devs hate hearing feedback without knowing what they could do better here it is. this will make this game the most famous gambling game ever.

1. allow players to change screen resolution.
2. Elaborate what the bonus's are better at beginning.
3. add crabs, blackjack.
4. make voice chat more visible so other can join if they see people in it.


This would make this my favorite steam game. but overall it is still great.

185780963.review: Like the love child of "Texas Hold'em" and "LA Noire," "Prominence Poker" offers a unique blend of poker realism and gritty storytelling that's both refreshing and entertaining.

185505346.review:
De todos los juegos de póquer que he probado sin duda me quedaría con este, ya que puedes tener tu avatar personalizado cómo a ti te gusta, las mesas de juego se ven bien en 3ª persona y da la sensación de estar realmente en esos escenarios rollo mafia jugandote el dinero todo ello a la gran ambientación y los detalles bien conseguidos del entorno.
En cuanto al juego te puede gustar más o menos pero es póquer texas hold'em no hay más.

Y lo bueno es que aquí no te piden que recargues fichas con dinero real basta con conectarte a diario, y ya con eso recibes fichas y según tu nivel y tu racha irás recibiendo más.

185497474.review: Well, if you've ever wanted to feel like a broke college student gambling their tuition away, Prominence Poker is your game. It's like the Vegas Strip, minus the expensive drinks and regret!

Absolutes Müll Game.

Like how can someone in 3 hands in a row get beaten by straight? what are the odds of it? rip of totally.

Edit: SO THIS GAME IS 1000% RIGGED!!!!! Imagine or not there were 2 Kings lurking from hand to hand man! 4 consecutive players next to each other, each hand had KK ... man F** such rigged game! this is total BS. Have to report for fraud TBH in gambling.

ODDS OF GETTING PAIR OF KK on each hand draw.

Final Odds:

The probability of three consecutive players each being dealt KK on three consecutive hands is:
P=110,799,161≈0.00000926 (or 0.000926%).
P=10,799,1611​≈0.00000926(or 0.000926%).

This is extremely rare, occurring roughly once in 10.8 million sequences of three consecutive hands.

184902089.review: Best poker game ever and for free. Great feel to the game and fun experience.

184836992.review: i love this poker game. I learned how to play in Red2, but then after i found out that there's such game on steam, i immediately played with my friends and colleagues, it's really an amazing game to play with friends who love poker.

184811120.review:
Отзыв на игру Prominence Poker.

Я большой любитель карточных игр, поэтому не мог пройти мимо «Prominence Poker». Эта игра сразу привлекла меня своим уникальным сеттингом и возможностью играть как в одиночном, так и в многопользовательском режиме.

В игре есть интересный сюжетный режим, который позволяет почувствовать себя настоящим игроком, а также множество турниров и событий для тех, кто хочет проверить свои навыки в соревновательном режиме. Кроме того, игра предлагает широкий выбор настроек для создания уникального внешнего вида персонажа.

Особенно мне нравится возможность взаимодействия с предметами на столе. Это добавляет игре реалистичности и позволяет лучше погрузиться в атмосферу настоящего покерного зала.

Графика и звук в игре также на высоком уровне. Все элементы дизайна продуманы до мелочей, а музыкальное сопровождение создает нужное настроение во время игры.

В целом, я очень доволен игрой «Prominence Poker» и рекомендую ее всем любителям карточных игр. Это отличный способ провести время и почувствовать себя настоящим игроком.

183791440.review: The game is much too slow.  This is online poker, somehow barely at the speed of live poker.  I have not seen the social aspects of the game in play at all.  Like voice chat.  You're just sitting in your chair waiting for your turn.  And watching avatars sit in their chairs, waiting for their turn.  There is so much going on visually, there needs to be something to do after you fold.  The avatars and environment make you feel like something should be happening.  But unless you play every hand, nothing is happening 90% of the time.
